DOC.brief_title: Composite Graft Use Abdominal Sacrocolpopexy Reduces Erosion Rates
DOC.detailed_description: This study examine erosion rate composite graft use abdominal sacrocolpopexy . The composite graft compose dual layer biological syntheric material . Biological graft advantage significantly reduce erosion rate , longevity biologic graft uncertain . On hand , synthetic graft advantage durable , high erosion rate vagina require re-operation small percentage patient . This study look whether use composite greaft carry advantage type material lead decreased rate erosion maintain longevity . The cost effectiveness new type graft also review since disavantage utilizing synthetic biologic graft increase cost .
DOC.criteria: Patients underwent abdominal sacrocolpopexy Drs . Noblett Lane 2001 present
